text: Hugh Keays-Byrne (18 May 1947 â€“ 2 December 2020) was an English-Australian actor and movie director. He moved to Australia in 1973. He was known for his roles as Toad in the 1974 movie Stone, Toecutter in the 1979 movie Mad Max, and Immortan Joe in the 2015 movie Mad Max: Fury Road. He was born in Srinagar, then-British India. Keays-Byrne died on 2 December 2020 at a hospital in Gosford, New South Wales at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Hugh Keays-Byrne at Theatricalia. title: Hugh Keays-Byrne
